message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's a game-changer in its field, and I believe it could significantly benefit your business. Given its value to you, I understand its worth is estimated at $15,000. My offer to you is to purchase this product for $14,000, which I believe strikes a fair balance between our interests. I'm confident you'll find the investment worthwhile. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or if you have any questions. Looking forward to your positive response.
